checkins.theBest: I hit MVP! I also get to go to Colorado this next week and I have so many fun things planned with people I love
checkins.theWorst: I need to code to finish my styling for REALIZATIONS
checkins.oneThing: I need to work on communication with family

checkins.theBest: I recently quit my job at Dry Bar which has been a huge relief because now I can 100 percent focus on school
checkins.theWorst: Tennessee has been amazing but I miss seeing my friends and family. Seeing them every 6 months is not enough.
checkins.oneThing: I could have more patients in stressful/ annoying situations

checkins.theBest: I went on vacation and now i get to present my app
checkins.theWorst: my fear of flying got worse
checkins.oneThing: check in with my friends more often

selfGratitude.content: I love that the last time I went to Colorado I spent time with my great grandpa and listened to all his stories
I made an awesome app and I'm so proud of it

forgiveness.offense: for not being there when I was in high school
always calling me when she is busy

goals.goal: I want to code on my off time
goals.steps: instead of watching TikTok I want to code and work on my linked in

goals.goal: I would love to be able to move to Hawaii one day
I would love to start meeting new people
goals.steps: I will start setting up coffee dates
once a week I will cook a new dish to make me more confident in the kitchen
I will take 15 minutes a day to read

recommended.title: The Possibility Principle
recommended.note: Hey guys check out this book, it completely changed my life.

recommended.title: Joe Rogan Podcast #1169
